name: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
overview: Get the Doom Out of Town! Yikes! Roger Rabbit will need four lucky feet to solve this hairy caper. Judge Doom wants the deed to Toontown, and he's got five sneaky Weasels to help him. They've kidnapped Jessica Rabbit and everyone's in danger, including Roger. Toontown's favorite hare turns private eye in this frisky adventure. On a rollicking search through the city's mazes, Roger hunts down clues and scares up information. Can Roger find the proof he needs? There's no time to sit and stew. Help Roger get the facts and put the whammy on Judge Doom!
